name: I Miei Amichi
description:
I Miei Amichi is a short, cute game about wandering around a heartwarming village, helping people with their cat-related problems. It´s a place full of cats, and some of them want to return home!

Talk to the people to know if they need your help, and then begin searching for their beloved pets. Find the cat that matches their description, click on it and come back to its owner to deliver it safely. Try to find all of them as fast as possible and share your time with your friends!
